content: materials purl soho s pouf 1 50% alpaca and 50% andean highland wool each ball of this super bulky-weight yarn is 108 yards/ 100 grams - main color 4 balls approximately 385 yards required - contrast color 2 balls approximately 130 yards required you ll also need - us 11 8 mm straight 2 or 24-inch circular knitting needles 3 gauge 11 stitches and 15 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch size finished dimensions 20 inches wide x 72 inches long designed by purl soho designer gianna mueller 4 see more of gianna s designs on her instagram 5 1 https //www purlsoho com/pouf html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter-straight_needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter-circular_needles html 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gianna-mueller-for-purl-soho/ 5 https //www instagram com/giannaknits/
